product_name: The North Face Impervious Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Impervious rain jacket for men delivers waterproof, breathable protection on your treks using two different Gore-Tex(R) fabrics to keep weight and bulk down, performance high. Lightweight Gore-Tex Paclite(R) 2-layer fabric throughout the body is windproof as well as waterproof and breathable. Shoulders are reinforced with Gore-Tex 3-layer fabric for added weather protection and durability. Pit zips allow immediate venting of excess heat. Adjustable hood; brushed collar lining for comfort. The North Face Impervious rain jacket offers zippered, vented alpine pockets placed to avoid pack straps and harness. Bonded self-fabric cuff tabs; hem cinch cord.
short_description: The North Face Impervious rain jacket for men delivers waterproof, breathable protection on your treks using two different Gore-Tex(R) fabrics to keep weight and bulk down, performance high.
